item.title: MtLUX
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MtLUX Gene Name: Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: In vivo and in vitro experiments showed that MtLUX directly binds to a cis-element in the promoter of MtTB1/MtTCP1A, suggesting that MtLUX regulates branching by rhythmically suppressing MtTB1/MtTCP1A.

item.title: MtSERF1
